Tyler,

Could you please explain how embedded hyperlinks work in Yurl or we=
b-calculus?

Take the case where I give you the Yurl for a Web resource whe=
re the
representation includes hyperlinks for other resources.

I might wan=
t you to be able GET representations from some of those
hyperlinks, edit an=
d PUT some of the others, POST to still others, and
some of them I don't ev=
en want you to see.  I mean, I might want
others to be able to see them, bu=
t not you.

I might want others to be able to get representations of the sa=
me
resource including a different subset of the hyperlinks the resource
kno=
ws about, with a different set of capabilities, maybe more or less
than wha=
t I gave you.

I think I can probably figure this out, but it's nice to get=
 it from the source.

Thanks,
Bob Haugen
